item.title: How to Fix Kubernetes DNS Redirect to External on Proxmox
item.author: Author
item.description: What Happened? I want deploy spring boot microservices and I have services called dexter and enclave and want communicate to each other using REST. They can communicate if I set service url using container hostname which is dexter and enclave. But somehow they won’t communicate if I use Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN) on kubernetes and got 302 Found. Seems redirect to external domain on public network which should not be registered.
